title: Cabrillo National Monument: BioBlitz
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Research     BioBlitz                Cabrillo BioBlitz Science          Whether you are looking to prepare your students or local groups to join us for the National Parks Bioblitz on May 21st, 2016 or perhaps you can’t make it out, we wanted everyone to join in on the fun! Cabrillo National Monument is proud to announce a new curriculum to coincide with this event. “Biodiversity Snapshot” encourages students and teachers to perform their own Bioblitz on their school playground or local open space. In compliance with Next Generation Science Standards, we sincerely hope that getting out into nature with these activities inspires the future stewards of America’s beautiful spaces.
